name: Windows Gather Unattended Answer File Enumeration
author: Sean Verity <veritysr1980@gmail.com>
sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>
Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>
description:
This module will check the file system for a copy of unattend.xml and/or
        autounattend.xml found in Windows Vista, or newer Windows systems.  And then
        extract sensitive information such as usernames and decoded passwords.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: GETALL
options.description: Collect all unattend.xml that are found
